title: Looking for a Support MAIN for 5's  Tourney Team
body:
Yo

were looking for a support main for 5's Gold+ preferred but exceptions can be made based on gameplay. 


**Requirements:**

Must have a working Mic
Must talk alot and communicate
Must get on Daily
Must be a memer ;^)
Must have fun but know when to be serious

**Applications: **

IGN:
Rank:
Main Champs:
Age:
Experience in Role:
Experience in League overall :
Anything else to add :

Im the adc for the team but posting for the leader

add me @ LowKey ADC for more info / tryouts and stuff

replies.body:
IGN:KingsEntourage
Rank: Silver 4
Main Champs: I can play every Support
Age: 23
Experience in Role: I played a lot of support last season for teams. I also have played Tons of bot lane this season mostly as ADC but still know matchups and how to play lane well.
Experience in League overall : Manager of high tier teams, Macro Analyst, and player for many years.
Anything else to add : I am just looking for a try out and if the team is right I am willing to get back into supporting.

IGN: Help I Suck
Rank: Plat V
Main Champs: Malphite, Thresh, Bard, Annie
Age: 27 
Experience in Role: Been playing support for a few years now
Experience in League overall : 
Anything else to add : I can't find you in game so you'll have to add me.

IGN: KingSpadeIX
Rank: Plat IV
Main Champs: Nami, Taric, Sona, are my go to picks right now, I also play Braum, Vel Koz, Janna
Age: 23
Experience in Role: Been a support main for about a year and a half. 
Experience in League overall : Very, i have played way too much. 

Anything else to add : Some general rules of thumb i think a team should go by would be to have at least 3 upgraded yellow trinkets a game. Vision wins games, and riot made those trinkets cheap. To play to live, dont tower dive and die when we are winning, that is not worth, trading kills is helping them more than us. Get scuttle crab 2 min before dragon spawns, this greatly helps dragon control. Dont just counter pick champions, counter building is even more important. 

Another thing to note: I am not in school, but i do work 35-40 hours a week. I may not be on every day (I do play a lot though), but if we set practice times i should be able to take off and make it on for it.

IGN: Maltie
Rank: P2
Main Champs: Bard, Thresh, Morgana
Age: 17
Experience in Role: Ive been switching roles for a while but I mained support for a while
Experience in League overall : Um, Ive played every role? I started in S1 and have only improved since then.
Anything else to add : I can play more than my main champs lol
bump still looking , ill add you if were interested in picking you up!

IGN: killmatter2
Rank: B5...ddon't underestimate me! Test me.
Main champs: Karma, Leona, nami, thresh, janna.
Age: 20 ;) I'm legal
experience: I play this game every day amongst any role. Maining jayce and karma for alternate picks between top, support,mid, and top.
added info: wards, pink wards,uupgraded trinkets, communication,piings, I mean I'm a bboss. You want game play let me come support you.

IGN: Charlienr1murphy
Rank: Gold
Main Champs: Thresh, morg, annie
Age: 18
Experience in Role: Lots, I have won two tournaments, and go 2nd in another 
Experience in League overall : playing for a long time
Anything else to add : nope

IGN:Vlad Bro
Rank: S2 was G4 last season
Main Champs: Morgana Thresh Janna Braum Lulu 
Age: 19
Experience in Role: Used to main ADC so familiar with matchups
Experience in League overall : Been playing since Xerath release at end of S1
Anything else to add :nope :)

IGN:CaptainHoonz
Rank:S1 this season looking to climb, G5 last season
Main Champs:Thresh, Bard, Leona, Blitz, janna, Nami, Naut... etc. i can play meta picks and odd picks
Age:19
Experience in Role: started out as sup main, been suppin for a while
Experience in League overall : I like to think that I have a firm grasp on meta, strategies and what to do when. i watch most lcs games so pretty good at shot calling as well
Anything else to add : Support carries.

Silver here

support main, played thresh around 800 games, u can try me out ive supported my plat adc friends and they think my support deserve to be much higher ranked than silver :)

IGN veginaslayer69

im 19

for support i main thresh leona and rarely sona, malphite, braum, zilean, etc depending on team comps.

I know where exactly to ward and when to roam etc, u can trust me as ur support :3

skype- i have but i may not use them regulary due to personal reasons, but most cases me and my adc after few games gets a synergy where we do better without speaking :)
